snippet: A sport utility vehicle was racing north on Amsterdam Avenue when it swerved onto the sidewalk at 97th Street and hit the child and her grandmother, the police said.
abstract: New York City police arrest 17-year-old Franklin Reyes for fatally striking 4-year-old Ariel Russo on an Upper West Side street with sport utility vehicle, as she walked on the sidewalk with her grandmother, who was injured in the crash; Reyes was fleeing from police after a routine traffic stop; he is charged with manslaughter and vehicular manslaughter.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Daniel Krieger and Fausto Pinto contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A sport utility vehicle was racing north on Amsterdam Avenue when it swerved onto the sidewalk at 97th Street and hit the child and her grandmother, the police said.

headline.seo: Girl, 4, Fatally Struck by a Car Fleeing the Police
headline.main: Girl, 4, Is Fatally Struck By a Car Fleeing the Police
headline.print_headline: Girl, 4, Is Fatally Struck By a Car Fleeing the Police
